column5: Please read the letter attached and call or write to your local riding MP!!1 C-38 letter to PM.pdf
I thought for sure that we would see comments posted on this issue, no?

Maybe people are too busy writing and phoning. And I'm sure a lot of them would also like things expressed in easier understood language, but I guess when one politician writes to another they will tend to speak in traditional bafflegab. I see all that stuff and my head begins to spin.
